dct_title_s: Aethiopia svperior vel interior, vulgo Abissinorvm sive Presbiteri Ioannis imperivm
dct_alternative_sm: Aethiopia superior vel interior, vulgo Abissinorum sive Presbiteri Ioannis imperium
dct_description_sm: Historical map of Northeastern and Central Africa depicting the Christian kingdom of Prester John.
Title in decorative cartouche with two standing adult figures and three children. Two of the children are sitting and holding umbrellas to shade the sun.
Includes scale bar with a child holding measuring calipers "Milliaria Germanica communia".
Includes illustration of animals, elephants, monkey, and ostriches are shown throughout map.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
